2026-01-08.body:

2026-01-08.body:

The order includes SDR integration on MiG-29, NCO installation, and 24 SDRs for LCA Mk 1A aircraft.

2026-01-08.title: vippy spinpro gets ₹208.4 cr loan from hdfc for expansion
2026-01-08.body:
Vippy Spinpro Ltd secured a ₹208.4 crore term loan from HDFC Bank for capacity expansion.

Loan has a 7.7% interest rate, 72-month tenure, 1-year moratorium, and secured by assets.

Source: ScoutQuest

2026-01-08.title: quantum digital auditor resigns early, cites work commitments
2026-01-08.body:
Quantum Digital Vision India Ltd announced the resignation of its statutory auditor, Shah Khandelwal Jain & Associates, effective 11.11.2025.

The resignation was due to pre-occupation and commitments. The firm's term was to expire at the AGM for FY 2026-27.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.title: tata elxsi, autolink partner for software-defined vehicles at ces 2026
2026-01-08.body:

2026-01-08.body:

2026-01-08.body:

2026-01-08.body:

Anrose Pharma ordered to pay ₹15 lakh within 8 weeks or face 8% annual interest.

2026-01-08.body:
Gold spot prices on Comex rose 2.2% this week, while MCX gold futures fell 0.2% to Rs 1,37,735/10g.

Rupee strength limited domestic gold gains; MCX gold expected to trade Rs 1,36,500-1,41,000 range.

2026-01-08.title: adani ports mundra handles india's 1st fully laden vlcc, boosts energy security
2026-01-08.body:
Adani Ports' Mundra Port berths India's first fully laden Very Large Crude Carrier (VLCC), Mt New Renown, showcasing advanced logistics.

Mundra's VLCC jetty, linked to HPCL Rajasthan Refinery, boosts India's energy security, efficiency, and regional economic growth.

Source: NDTV Profit

2026-01-08.title: stocks to watch: bharat forge, vedanta, bajaj finserv amid key updates
2026-01-08.body:
Stocks to watch: Bharat Forge, Vedanta, RVNL, BHEL, Bajaj Finserv; key updates include order wins, results, stake sales.

Bajaj Finserv ups stake in insurance units; Bharat Forge partners Agile Robots for AI automation; Vedanta files court petition.

Source: CNBC TV 18

2026-01-08.title: bhel bags ₹5,400 cr order for odisha ammonium nitrate project
2026-01-08.body:
BHEL secures a domestic order worth approx. INR 5400 Cr from BCGCL, a JV of BHEL and CIL.

Order involves design, engineering, equipment supply, and O&M for a 2000 TPD ammonium nitrate project in Odisha.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.title: imec services' promoter reclassification rejected by exchange
2026-01-08.body:
IMEC Services' application for reclassification of promoters to public was rejected by the stock exchange.

The company awaits formal communication on the rejection and remains committed to regulatory compliance.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.title: swadha nature to review q3 results on jan 17, 2026
2026-01-08.body:
Swadha Nature Ltd's Board meeting is scheduled for January 17, 2026, to review Q3 FY26 unaudited results.

The meeting will also address other business matters with Chairman's permission.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.title: sbi files nclt case against future consumer for default; hearing delayed to 2026
2026-01-08.body:
SBI filed an NCLT case against Future Consumer Ltd citing default from Apr 1, 2022.

Hearing delayed to Jan 8, 2026, with the next date set for Feb 16, 2026.

Source: ScoutQuest

2026-01-08.title: sterling wilson to review q3 results on jan 15; trading window closed
2026-01-08.body:
Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy Ltd's board to meet on Jan 15, 2026, for Q3 and 9-month financial results.

Trading window remains closed till 48 hours after results, per insider trading regulations.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.body:

2026-01-08.title: tvs motor board to review q3 results on jan 28; trading window closed
2026-01-08.body:
TVS Motor's board will meet on 28th Jan 2026 to review unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended Dec 2025.

Trading window for TVS Motor scrips is closed from 1st Jan to 30th Jan 2026 per insider trading regulations.

2026-01-08.body:

The refund includes Rs. 6.5 lakh tax and Rs. 1.9 lakh interest; no penalties reported.

2026-01-08.body:
Tax authorities searched Suyog Telematics' premises with no negative orders issued.

2026-01-08.title: bajaj holdings ups stake in bajaj general & life to 97%
2026-01-08.body:
Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd acquires 17.56% equity in Bajaj General and Bajaj Life from Allianz SE.

Bajaj Finserv and Jamnalal Sons also acquired stakes; collective holding now 97% in both companies.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.title: venus remedies gets indonesia nod for multi-drug resistant infection drug
2026-01-08.body:
Venus Remedies secures Indonesia approval for Ceftazidime-Avibactam, treating multi-drug resistant infections.

Approval enables commercialization through existing distribution partnerships in Indonesia.

Source: ScoutQuest

2026-01-08.title: bharat forge, agile robots partner for ai automation in key sectors
2026-01-08.body:

Collaboration focuses on automotive, healthcare, and electronics sectors, expanding in India and SE Asia.

Source: ScoutQuest

2026-01-08.body:

2026-01-08.title: gravity india md manoj ramavat resigns, effective jan 2026
2026-01-08.body:
Gravity India Ltd's Managing Director, Manoj K. Ramavat, has resigned effective January 8, 2026.

Resignation due to professional commitments; no other material reasons stated.

Source: BSE

2026-01-08.title: bajaj finserv buys allianz's 23% stake in insurance units for ₹21,390 cr
2026-01-08.body:

This raises Bajaj's ownership to 97%, ending its joint venture with Allianz SE.

Source: ScoutQuest
